plot: Under Newport soil Two Dragons are locked in a bloody battle. But the locals have better things to worry about... Has Dilys missed her Glyn Williams? Should Tiffany dump Merlin? Will Dean ever get a light for his spliff?
title: Two Dragons
plot_es: Under Newport soil Two Dragons are locked in a bloody battle. But the locals have better things to worry about... Has Dilys missed her Glyn Williams? Should Tiffany dump Merlin? Will Dean ever get a light for his spliff?
